# startIndex

**Instance Property**

The position of the first element in a nonempty collection. (See `Collection.startIndex`.)

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var startIndex: Int { get }
```

## Manipulating indices

- **endIndex**: TThe collection’s “past the end” position—that is, the position one greater than the last valid subscript argument. (See `Collection.endIndex`.)
- **index(after:)**: Returns the position immediately after the given index. (See `Collection.index`.)
